attributes.action: make the courts look at Anjem Choudhry sentence of 5.5 years should get longer
attributes.background:
get the courts to look at the sentence handed down to Anjem Choudhry has it was to lenient should of got at least a minimum of 10 years for the terrorists crimes committed by this evil man and his followers.
should automatically be  minimum 10 yrs for all like him

rejection.details:
Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low, and only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
